page.title: 14Old peoples home
page.content: At Rolands House there are 19 people and 15 flats with the wardens flat. There are mainly ladies in Rolands House at the moment with around 2/3 men there. The main things that go on in the year are Life boat bazaars and christmas dinners.There are two sorts of rooms a bed sitter or a normal flat.A bed sitter is a living room with a bed in.Rolands House has been there for 13 years and 2 months.There are 2 helpers and a warden.You are allowed pets if you had them before you came.The old people were pleased to see us.We meet them in the common room.The common room is where they all meet for special occasions.We were glad to see the old people. They were very intresting to talk to. At the end they gave us a cup of tea and some sweets.
